scripts.initialize: npm run build && node dist/cli.js initialize
scripts.create-ecosystem: npm run build && node dist/cli.js create-ecosystem
scripts.create-token-account: npm run build && node dist/cli.js create-token-account
scripts.deposit: npm run build && node dist/cli.js deposit
scripts.add-approver: npm run build && node dist/cli.js add-approver
scripts.remove-approver: npm run build && node dist/cli.js remove-approver
scripts.request-withdrawal: npm run build && node dist/cli.js request-withdrawal
scripts.approve-withdrawal: npm run build && node dist/cli.js approve-withdrawal
scripts.check-balance: npm run build && node dist/cli.js check-balance
scripts.run-all: npm run build && node dist/cli.js run-all
